description:
Yuma gets taken for a wild ride when Kari`s friend steals an extremely lucky card from the local museum!  Relying on pure skill, Yuma must figure out a way to beat the luckiest guy in the world!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Leben ist ein Karneval - Teil 1
His name is Charlie, the Man with the Strongest Luck in History
Sono Na wa Charly! Saikyo no Un o Motsu Otoko
その名はチャーリー! 史上最強の運を持つ男
